channel.title: Comments on: Now now. Recon players receive too much hate in my opinion. We’re mostly the same after all.
channel.description: Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War is a first-person shooter video game developed by Treyarch and Raven Software and published by Activision. r/BlackOpsColdWar is a developer-recognized community focused on the title.

item.title: By: HEAVYtanker2000
item.dc:creator: HEAVYtanker2000
item.description: Iron sight Kar98k bayonet madman here. I love it, even though it can be though at times, itâ€™s hella rewarding

item.title: By: Ataniphor
item.dc:creator: Ataniphor
item.description:
honestly the weapon themselves are fine. recon weapons feel very underpowered in comparison to semi autos of assault and jungle carabine is better aggressive sniper than anything the recon has.
It's the recon playstyle of sitting in a bush all day that most people hate. i actually like ZH players since they tend to ptfo more.
item.content:encoded:
honestly the weapon themselves are fine. recon weapons feel very underpowered in comparison to semi autos of assault and jungle carabine is better aggressive sniper than anything the recon has.

It’s the recon playstyle of sitting in a bush all day that most people hate. i actually like ZH players since they tend to ptfo more.

item.description: We all know m30 drilling best sniper

item.title: By: nemesis_464
item.dc:creator: nemesis_464
item.description:
Recon players receive so much hate because it feels like >75% of them sit at the back in pointless areas on Breakthrough.
Also constant flare spam is so annoying to play against.
item.content:encoded:
Recon players receive so much hate because it feels like >75% of them sit at the back in pointless areas on Breakthrough.

Also constant flare spam is so annoying to play against.
